models.losses package¶

Submodules¶

models.losses.custom_loss_functions module¶

models.losses.custom_loss_functions.balanced_cross_entropy(beta)[source]¶

Balanced binary crossentropy. Very useful for class imbalanced image segmentation

Parameters

  • beta – the weighting factor (float). For an explanation on how this works see:

  • https – //lars76.github.io/neural-networks/object-detection/losses-for-segmentation/

models.losses.custom_loss_functions.dice_coef(y_true, y_pred)[source]¶

Calculate the dice loss

Parameters

  • y_true – the labeled mask corresponding to an rgb image

  • y_pred – the predicted mask of an rgb image

Returns

A metric that accounts for precision and recall

on the scale from 0 - 1. The closer to 1, the better.

Return type

dice_coeff

Citation (MIT License): https://github.com/jocicmarko/

ultrasound-nerve-segmentation/blob/ master/train.py

models.losses.custom_loss_functions.weighted_cross_entropy(beta)[source]¶

Weighted binary crossentropy. Very useful for class imbalanced image segmentation

Parameters

  • beta – the weighting factor (float). For an explanation on how this works see:

  • https – //lars76.github.io/neural-networks/object-detection/losses-for-segmentation/
